Description: Medallion as amulet (?): a circular medallion in translucent pale amber-yellow glass. On the obverse, in raised relief, a standing figure, frontal, between two stags. Probably the goddess Diana. Moulded. Reverse plain, surface iridescent. It is supplied with a suspension loop.
Bibliographic references: Entwistle & Finney 2013 / Late Antique Glass Pendants in the British Museum (11)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
